title: Handle a Shipping Temperature Excursion
description: A shipment of a refrigerated product arrives at a pharmacy, and the temperature monitor shows it went above the required 8°C for 4 hours.

tasks.description: Log the temperature excursion event in the quality system, including the duration and peak temperature.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a new quality event record with all the details of the excursion.

tasks.description: Consult the product's stability data to determine if the excursion impacts product quality.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent checks the stability profile and finds that the product is stable for up to 6 hours at the recorded temperature.

tasks.description: Make a disposition decision for the product.
tasks.expected_outcome: Based on the stability data, the agent makes the decision that the product is still usable and can be released.

tasks.description: Document the investigation and disposition decision, and close the quality event.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent writes a summary report of the investigation and closes the event record.
